Affix.Name: Brave Heart
Affix.Desc: Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Outset of the Brave
EQUIP_RING.Desc: A crude wooden vessel filled only with memories.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Prospect of the Brave
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: A shimmering feather from a songbird that brings a nudge of courage to its wearer.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Crown of the Brave
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: A rough-and-ready laurel wreath that seems as precious as a king's golden crown.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Medal of the Brave
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: A simple flower brooch that is a keepsake from someone's first adventure.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Fortitude of the Brave
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: A dated miniature hourglass that serves no practical purpose. It seems as elusive as time itself.
